creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
the "new publication" usecase creates wrong entries in config/publication.xconf:
  <templates>
    <tamplate id="default"/>
    <template id="actual_template"/>
  </templates>
the default publication is always listed first, resulting in the new child not
inheriting anything from the actual template.

workaround is to manually delete the "default" line.
